name: Transmission: Kill
description:
Transmission: Kill is a classic survival horror experience in a side scrolling perspective. Featuring genre staples such as manual saves, interactive puzzles, and grotesque monsters to blast, Transmission: Kill harkens back to a simpler era of atmospheric horror.

Stranded and wounded on a forgotten planet somewhere in the Triangulum Galaxy, you find yourself in front of an old alien power substation. But what lurks inside is more dangerous than any enemy you've encountered before. As a genre fusion between "Metroidvania" and "Survival Horror", you'll jump, shoot, and use your wits to survive. Blast enemies with three different weapons, solve various puzzles, and scavenge for items as you attempt to escape the horrors inside the substation. 

  • 3 weapons to collect
  • 5 areas to explore
  • Various puzzles to solve and clues to find
  • Manual saving
  • Scarce supplies make for a difficult adventure
  • 45mins-1hr play-time for first time play through
  • Time recorded at the end of each playthrough! See how fast you can complete it

Transmission: Kill was born out of my love for the original resident evil, and the metroidvania genre, and the attempt to bridge the gap between the two. This was a ton of fun to work on and I hope you give it a try!

WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
E - Activate
F - Heal
R - Reload
Mouse/left click - look + shoot
Mouse wheel - change weapon
Enter - Map/items
